description: Chinese astilbe (Astilbe chinensis var. davidii) is an amazing plant that is sure to add a splash of color and life to any garden. It is a stunning herbaceous perennial that can reach up to three feet tall and features purple or pink spike flowers. The foliage of Chinese astilbe is a vibrant emerald green with glossy foliage. In addition, it is quite easy to maintain and can tolerate high levels of shade, making it a great choice for those with shady gardens. It can also be used as a cut flower in floral arrangements, adding a vibrant floral pop. Overall, Chinese astilbe is an extraordinary choice for adding long-lasting beauty to any flowerbed.
